cluster_segment.name: The Traditionalist
cluster_segment.description: Early stage of AI maturity. Often characterized by siloed experiments or legacy infrastructure. Focus is needed on foundational strategy and literacy to unlock value.

structural_anomalies.message: Data Readiness & Literacy (3.0) is significantly ahead of Use Cases & Business Value (2.0).
structural_anomalies.risk_description: You are collecting data but not using it. This creates a 'Data Swamp' risk where investment in storage yields no ROI.

structural_anomalies.message: Processes & Scaling (3.2) is significantly ahead of Governance & Compliance (2.0).
structural_anomalies.risk_description: You are scaling processes without safety rails. This increases the risk of technical debt or regulatory failure.

strategic_recommendation.rationale: Your peers are 42% ahead of you in this area.
strategic_recommendation.context: Companies in your structural peer group who have successfully moved to the next level did so by prioritizing this dimension.

peer_benchmarking.description: Comparison against 'Next Level' peers (15-30% more mature)
